scene_description_enriched: Two figures, a woman in a red cloak and a man in a blue robe, embrace. The woman's head is tilted back, and the man leans in, appearing to kiss her. They stand in front of a building with large columns and an arched opening. To the right, a path leads into a garden with trees and foliage. The scene is framed by an ornate, scrolling border with floral motifs.
